name: py-pyworld

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PyWorld wrappers WORLD, which is a free software for high-quality speech
analysis, manipulation and synthesis. It can estimate fundamental
frequency (F0), aperiodicity and spectral envelope and also generate the
speech like input speech with only estimated parameters.i

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
